messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hi, I'm calling because I'm on my way to work going northbound on Redwood Road.
Right around just a little south of the Harvest Hills area on the west side of Redwood, I saw a man walking with a samurai sword.
How many minutes ago was this?
About 5 minutes ago.
And he was on the west side of the road?
Yep. He was walking in the direction of Walmart.
Can you describe him for me? How old did he look?
He looked young, maybe between 20 and 30 years old.
What race was he?
I'm not sure, but he might have been black or Polynesian.
About how tall did he seem?
It's hard to say, but he wasn't overly tall. Maybe around six feet.
Could you estimate his weight?
He was fairly skinny, probably around 150 pounds.
What color hair did he have?
Black. It was kind of an afro style, but pulled back a little bit, like a giant bun on the back of his head.
And you said he had a red shirt? What color pants?
I don't remember the color of his pants.
Okay, hold on one second.
Alright. And your name, sir?
Got a phone number we can reach you at?
Alright. We'll go ahead and get this out to an officer, and we'll have them go check the area. If they have any questions, they will contact you by phone.
Sounds good. Thank you.
You're welcome.
Bye.
Bye-bye.
